alert.note: Alert for Floyd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:27PM EDT until May 16 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MARTIN...NORTHEASTERN FLOYD AND NORTHWESTERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 426 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Banner, or 7 miles southeast of Prestonsburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Justell around 430 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include McCombs and Gulnare. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
